results.title: Arrhythmogenic mechanisms of acute obstructive respiratory events in a porcine model of drug-induced long QT.
results.text_hl: We also investigated the effect of a reduced repolarization reserve in drug-induced @<m>DISEASE_Long_QT_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008133 @@@long QT@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Long_QT_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008133 @@@LQT@@@) following INAP-induced changes in ventricular repolarization.

results.title: Intrauterine Growth Retardation in Pregnant Women with Long QT Syndrome Treated with Beta-Receptor Blockers.
results.text_hl: They are therefore recommended, except @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@, as first-line therapy for pregnant @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@.

citations.NLM: Welzel T, Donner B, van den Anker JN. Intrauterine Growth Retardation in Pregnant Women with Long QT Syndrome Treated with Beta-Receptor Blockers. Neonatology. 2021;118(4):406-415. PMID: 34186538

results.title: Contribution of haemodynamic side effects and associated autonomic reflexes to ventricular arrhythmias triggering by torsadogenic hERG blocking drugs
results.text_hl: @<m>DISEASE_Long_QT_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008133 @@@QTc prolongation@@@ induced by these hERG channel blockers were unmasked in the presence of the beta-blocker @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ (1 mg>/kg/i.v.).

results.title: The Efficacy of Beta-Blockers in Patients With Long QT Syndrome 1-3 According to Individuals' Gender, Age, and QTc Intervals: A Network Meta-analysis
results.text_hl: Conversely, @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ efficacy for risk reduction seemed somewhat lower than for @CHEMICAL_Nadolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009248 @@@nadolol@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ vs.

results.title: Effectiveness of beta-blockers depending on the genotype of congenital long-QT syndrome: A meta-analysis
results.text_hl: We searched MEDLINE, EMBASE, and CENTRAL databases to investigate the use of beta-blockers (@<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@, @CHEMICAL_Nadolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009248 @@@nadolol@@@, @CHEMICAL_Propranolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011433 @@@propranolol@@@, and @CHEMICAL_Metoprolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008790 @@@metoprolol@@@) in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Long_QT_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008133 @@@LQTS@@@.

citations.NLM: Ahn J, Kim HJ, Choi JI, Lee KN, Shim J, Ahn HS, Kim YH. Effectiveness of beta-blockers depending on the genotype of congenital long-QT syndrome: A meta-analysis PLoS One. 2017;12(10):e0185680. PMID: 29059199

results.title: Use of a cardioselective beta-blocker for pediatric patients with prolonged QT syndrome.
results.text_hl: The data on the efficacy of @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ for @<m>DISEASE_Long_QT_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008133 @@@long-QT syndrome@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Long_QT_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008133 @@@LQTS@@@) are controversial.

results.title: Atenolol in children with ventricular arrhythmias.
results.text_hl: Three of these four @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ also had structural abnormalities or @DISEASE_Heart_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D006331 @@@myocardial dysfunction@@@. @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@Atenolol@@@ was effective in treating 4 of 10 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Long_QT_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008133 @@@long QT syndrome@@@ with a dosage of approximately 1.5 mg/kg/day.

results.title: Coincidence of long QT syndrome and propionic acidemia.
results.text_hl: Although the @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ was asymptomatic and @DISEASE_Arrhythmias_Cardiac @DISEASE_MESH:D001145 @@@arrhythmia@@@ free, we started her on @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@. This is the first report of the association between @<m>DISEASE_Long_QT_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008133 @@@LQTS@@@ and @DISEASE_Propionic_Acidemia @DISEASE_MESH:D056693 @@@propionic acidemia@@@.

results.title: Beta-blocker therapy failures in symptomatic probands with genotyped long-QT syndrome.
results.text_hl: Beta-blocker therapy is one of the principal therapies for @<m>DISEASE_Long_QT_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008133 @@@congenital long-QT syndrome@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Long_QT_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008133 @@@LQTS@@@).
